name: Swiftstep Armed Courier

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.

description: A warrior from the Canopy, and a tribal guardian that patrols the forest valleys and mountain streams.\nMany wonder if claymores are too heavy to be wielded by the couriers of the Scions of the Canopy, but perhaps it is precisely because their duties are heavier still that a weapon more capable of deterrence is a necessity.
